verses.verse: Go To <S%G71><s%> Now, <S%G3568><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Ye Rich <S%G4145><s%> Weep, <S%G2799><s%> Howling <S%G3649><s%> Over <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Miseries <S%G5004><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> That Are <S%G3588><s%> Coming Upon You. <S%G1904><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Riches <S%G4149><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> Have Rotted, <S%G4595><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2440><s%> Your Garments <S%G5216><s%> Moth Eaten <S%G4598><s%> Have Become. <S%G1096><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G5557><s%> Your Gold <S%G5216><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Silver <S%G696><s%> Has Been Eaten Away, <S%G2728><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Their Canker <S%G2447><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> A Testimony <S%G3142><s%> Against You <S%G5213><s%> Shall Be, <S%G2071><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Eat <S%G5315><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4561><s%> Your Flesh <S%G5216><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Fire. <S%G4442><s%> Ye Treasured Up <S%G2343><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Last <S%G2078><s%> Days. <S%G2250><s%>

Lo, <S%G2400><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hire <S%G3408><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Workmen <S%G2040><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Harvested <S%G270><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5561><s%> Your Fields, <S%G5216><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Has Been Kept Back <S%G650><s%> ' By <S%G575><s%> You, <S%G5216><s%> Cries Out, <S%G2896><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cries <S%G995><s%> Of Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Reaped, <S%G2325><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ears <S%G3775><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> Of Hosts <S%G4519><s%> Have Entered. <S%G1525><s%>

Ye Lived In Indulgence <S%G5171><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lived In Self Gratification; <S%G4684><s%> Ye Nourished <S%G5142><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Your Hearts <S%G5216><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> A Day <S%G2250><s%> Of Slaughter; <S%G4967><s%>
Ye Condemned, <S%G2613><s%> Ye Killed, <S%G5407><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Just; <S%G1342><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Does Not Resist <S%G498><s%> You. <S%G5213><s%>

Be Patient <S%G3114><s%> Therefore, <S%G3767><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> Till <S%G2193><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Coming <S%G3952><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%> , Lo, <S%G2400><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Husbandman <S%G1092><s%> Awaits <S%G1551><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Precious <S%G5093><s%> Fruit <S%G2590><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> Being Patient <S%G3114><s%> ' For <S%G1909><s%> It <S%G846><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Until <S%G302><s%> It Receive The <S%G2983><s%> Rain <S%G5205><s%> Early <S%G4406><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Latter. <S%G3797><s%>

Be Patient <S%G3114><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye : <S%G5210><s%> Establish <S%G4741><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Your Hearts, <S%G5216><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Coming <S%G3952><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Has Drawn Near. <S%G1448><s%>

<S%G3361><s%> Groan Not <S%G4727><s%> ' Against <S%G2596><s%> One Another, <S%G240><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Ye Be Condemned. <S%G2632><s%> , Lo, <S%G2400><s%> The Judge <S%G2923><s%> Before <S%G4253><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Door <S%G2374><s%> <S%G2476><s%> <S%G2476><s%>

As An Example <S%G5262><s%> Take <S%G2983><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Suffering Evils, <S%G2552><s%> <S%G80><s%> , My Brethren, <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Patience, <S%G3115><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophets <S%G4396><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Spoke <S%G2980><s%> In The <S%G3588><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%>

Lo, <S%G2400><s%> We Call Blessed <S%G3106><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Endure. <S%G5278><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Endurance <S%G5281><s%> Of Job <S%G2492><s%> Ye Have Heard Of, <S%G191><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> End <S%G5056><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> Ye Saw; <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Full Of Tender Pity <S%G4184><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Compassionate. <S%G3629><s%>

Before <S%G4253><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3956><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G80><s%> My Brethren, <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Swear Not, <S%G3660><s%> Neither By <S%G3383><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> Nor <S%G3383><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth; <S%G1093><s%> Nor <S%G3383><s%> <S%G243><s%> Any Other <S%G5100><s%> Oath; <S%G3727><s%> <S%G2277><s%> But Let Be <S%G1161><s%> Of You <S%G5216><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Yea, <S%G3483><s%> Yea, <S%G3483><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nay, <S%G3756><s%> Nay, <S%G3756><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Hypocrisy <S%G5272><s%> Ye May Fall. <S%G4098><s%>

Does Suffer Hardships <S%G2553><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> You? <S%G5213><s%> Let Him Pray : <S%G4336><s%> Is Cheerful <S%G2114><s%> Anyone? <S%G5100><s%> Let Him Praise; <S%G5567><s%>

Is Sick <S%G770><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> You? <S%G5213><s%> Let Him Call To Him <S%G4341><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elders <S%G4245><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly, <S%G1577><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Let Them Pray <S%G4336><s%> ' Over <S%G1909><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Having Anointed <S%G218><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> With Oil <S%G1637><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prayer <S%G2171><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Shall Save <S%G4982><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Exhausted One, <S%G2577><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Raise Up <S%G1453><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%> And If <S%G2579><s%> Sins <S%G266><s%> <S%G5600><s%> He Be One Who Has Committed, <S%G4160><s%> It Shall Be Forgiven <S%G863><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

Confess <S%G1843><s%> To One Another Your <S%G240><s%> <S%G3588><s%> , Offences, <S%G3900><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Pray <S%G2172><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> One Another, <S%G240><s%> That <S%G3704><s%> Ye May Be Healed. <S%G2390><s%> Much <S%G4183><s%> Prevails The <S%G2480><s%> Supplication <S%G1162><s%> Of A Righteous Man <S%G1342><s%> Operative. <S%G1754><s%>

Elijah <S%G2243><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Of Like Feelings <S%G3663><s%> To Us, <S%G2254><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With Prayer <S%G4335><s%> He Prayed For It <S%G4336><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Rain; <S%G1026><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> It Did Rain <S%G1026><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> Years <S%G1763><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Months <S%G3376><s%> Six; <S%G1803><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> He Prayed, <S%G4336><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> Rain <S%G5205><s%> Gave, <S%G1325><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> Caused To Sprout <S%G985><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fruit <S%G2590><s%> Its. <S%G846><s%>

Brethren, <S%G80><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Err <S%G4105><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Truth, <S%G225><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Bring Back <S%G1994><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%>

Let Him Know <S%G1097><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Brings Back <S%G1994><s%> A Sinner <S%G268><s%> From The <S%G1537><s%> Error <S%G4106><s%> <S%G3598><s%> Of His Way, <S%G846><s%> Shall Save <S%G4982><s%> A Soul <S%G5590><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Death, <S%G2288><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Cover <S%G2572><s%> A Multitude <S%G4128><s%> Of Sins. <S%G266><s%>
